trans-unit.source: Provides the page adapter class for the WML device adapter set specifically designed for Openwave's UP browser.
trans-unit.target: 針對特定為 Openwave 的 UP 瀏覽器所設計的 WML 裝置配接器集，提供頁面配置器類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlPageAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlPageAdapter" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回適用於指定配接器的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 適用於指定配接器的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The current request context.
trans-unit.target: 目前的要求內容。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: 評估裝置配接器集是否適用於指定的要求。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果裝置配接器集套用至指定的要求，則為<see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Class
trans-unit.target: 類別

trans-unit.source: Returns
trans-unit.target: Returns

trans-unit.source: Preferred rendering type
trans-unit.target: 慣用的轉譯型別

trans-unit.source: Check value of JavaScript property
trans-unit.target: 檢查 JavaScript 屬性的值

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查是否值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> 屬性會傳回 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查是否值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> 屬性會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查是否值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>。

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 不適用。
